name: MoycaAddition
0:
”Alexa open Moyca Addition.”
”Alexa, launch Moyca Addition.”
”off”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: moyca addition
des: This Alexa skill will help re-enforce basic addition skills by repeating addition problems and verifying they are correct. It will work with all Alexa devices and currently supports displays, although it is not required. All addition problems are limited to single digit problems.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
